channel.title: Cant log in with ANY client
channel.description:
I have tried probably 6 different clients now, and everyone of them fails to log in to any server, even the ones that I KNOW are online. It just recently starting doing this. It loads fine, but it isn't a second before it says Error Connecting to Server. Does anyone know what could be a problem?
It did not do this before.... :/

item.title: Cant log in with ANY client
item.dc:creator: @go_range_go go range go
item.description:
@go_range_go wrote:

Its happening to me too. And it hasn’t ever before. I have been on here for a week and tried different servers and clients but it says “Error Connecting To Server”. Someone please help us out!

Read full topic
item.source: Cant log in with ANY client
